shards.name: Physical Shard
shards.description: Mastery of body, movement, endurance, and physical capability

achievements.name: Cardio Curious
achievements.description: Try 3 different cardio activities (running, cycling, swimming, rowing, etc.)

achievements.name: Heart Starter
achievements.description: Complete 10 cardio sessions of 20+ minutes each

achievements.name: Distance Seeker
achievements.description: Complete a 5K (3.1 miles) at any pace

achievements.name: First Rep
achievements.description: Complete your first strength training workout

achievements.name: Push Through
achievements.description: Perform 10 proper push-ups in a row

achievements.name: Leg Day Initiate
achievements.description: Complete 25 bodyweight squats with proper form

achievements.name: Stretch Beginner
achievements.description: Complete 7 consecutive days of 10+ minute stretching

achievements.name: Touch Down
achievements.description: Touch your toes from standing position with straight legs

achievements.name: Limber Up
achievements.description: Attend your first yoga or flexibility class

achievements.name: Hydration Hero
achievements.description: Drink 8 glasses of water daily for 7 consecutive days

achievements.name: Meal Prep Novice
achievements.description: Prepare 3 healthy meals from scratch in one week

achievements.name: Sleep Scholar
achievements.description: Get 7+ hours of sleep for 7 consecutive nights

achievements.name: Step Counter
achievements.description: Walk 10,000 steps in a single day

achievements.name: Body Baseline
achievements.description: Record starting measurements (weight, body fat %, key measurements)

achievements.name: Movement Explorer
achievements.description: Try a physical activity you've never done before

achievements.name: Foundation Complete
achievements.description: Unlock all 19 other Tier I Physical achievements

achievements.name: Heart Rate Master
achievements.description: Train in different heart rate zones for 4 weeks

achievements.name: Strength Routine
achievements.description: Follow a structured strength program for 12 weeks

achievements.name: Bodyweight Boss
achievements.description: Perform 25 push-ups, 10 pull-ups, 50 squats in one session

achievements.name: Barbell Basics
achievements.description: Learn and perform the big 5 lifts (squat, deadlift, bench, overhead press, row)

achievements.name: Flexibility Progress
achievements.description: Achieve front split or middle split (beginner depth)

achievements.name: Balance Master
achievements.description: Hold single-leg balance for 60 seconds each side with eyes closed

achievements.name: Movement Flow
achievements.description: Complete a 10-minute movement flow routine combining multiple skills

achievements.name: Handstand Journey
achievements.description: Hold a wall-assisted handstand for 30 seconds

achievements.name: Race Day
achievements.description: Complete your first official race (5K, 10K, triathlon, etc.)

achievements.name: Speed Demon
achievements.description: Improve your mile time by 2+ minutes from baseline

achievements.name: Workout Streak
achievements.description: Exercise 5+ days per week for 8 consecutive weeks

achievements.name: Recovery Protocol
achievements.description: Establish and follow a recovery routine (foam rolling, stretching, ice baths)

achievements.name: Body Recomposition
achievements.description: Lose 10+ lbs of fat OR gain 10+ lbs of muscle (measurable)

achievements.name: Sub-2 Hour Half
achievements.description: Run a half marathon in under 2 hours

achievements.name: Triathlon Finisher
achievements.description: Complete a sprint or Olympic distance triathlon

achievements.name: Strength Benchmark
achievements.description: Achieve intermediate strength standards (1.5x bodyweight squat, 2x deadlift, 1x bench)

achievements.name: One-Arm Achievement
achievements.description: Perform a one-arm push-up on each side

achievements.name: Pistol Squat Pro
achievements.description: Perform 10 pistol squats on each leg

achievements.name: Advanced Calisthenics
achievements.description: Hold a freestanding handstand for 30 seconds

achievements.name: Sport Competitor
achievements.description: Compete in an official athletic competition

achievements.name: Podium Finish
achievements.description: Place top 3 in your age group in any competition

achievements.name: Coach Certified
achievements.description: Obtain a recognized fitness coaching certification

achievements.name: Training Others
achievements.description: Successfully coach 5+ people to achieve their fitness goals

achievements.name: Body Fat Achievement
achievements.description: Reach 12% body fat (men) or 20% (women) while maintaining muscle

achievements.name: Flexibility Master
achievements.description: Achieve full front split and middle split

achievements.name: Endurance Beast
achievements.description: Complete a 50K ultramarathon or equivalent endurance event

achievements.name: Iron Person
achievements.description: Complete 100 push-ups, 50 pull-ups, 200 squats in one day

achievements.name: Recovery Expert
achievements.description: Go 365 days without injury while training intensely

achievements.name: Physical Authority
achievements.description: Create and publish your own training methodology or program

achievements.name: Marathon Master
achievements.description: Complete a marathon (26.2 miles) in under 4 hours

achievements.name: Boston Qualifier
achievements.description: Run a marathon fast enough to qualify for Boston Marathon

achievements.name: Ironman Finisher
achievements.description: Complete a full Ironman triathlon (2.4mi swim, 112mi bike, 26.2mi run)

achievements.name: National Competitor
achievements.description: Compete at a national-level athletic competition

achievements.name: Advanced Strength
achievements.description: Achieve advanced strength standards (2x bodyweight squat, 2.5x deadlift, 1.5x bench)

achievements.name: Bodyweight Mastery
achievements.description: Perform planche, front lever, or human flag for 10+ seconds

achievements.name: Strongman Achievement
achievements.description: Complete a strongman competition or equivalent feat

achievements.name: Olympic Lifting
achievements.description: Clean & jerk your bodyweight, snatch 75% bodyweight

achievements.name: Grip Strength Legend
achievements.description: Tear a phone book or close a #3 gripper

achievements.name: Regional Champion
achievements.description: Win or place top 3 in a regional athletic competition

achievements.name: Multi-Discipline Master
achievements.description: Compete at high level in 3+ different sports/disciplines

achievements.name: Speed Record
achievements.description: Set a facility/local record in any athletic discipline

achievements.name: Age Group Domination
achievements.description: Rank top 10 in your age group nationally in any discipline

achievements.name: Master Coach
achievements.description: Coach athletes who achieve competition-level success

achievements.name: Training Innovation
achievements.description: Develop a training method adopted by others in your sport

achievements.name: Media Recognition
achievements.description: Featured in fitness/athletic media for achievements

achievements.name: Decade of Dedication
achievements.description: Maintain elite fitness for 10+ consecutive years

achievements.name: Physical Polymath
achievements.description: Achieve Tier III competency in 5+ different physical disciplines

achievements.name: Olympic Qualifier
achievements.description: Qualify for Olympic trials in any discipline

achievements.name: World Record Setter
achievements.description: Set a world record in any athletic discipline

achievements.name: Ultra Iron
achievements.description: Complete an ultra-distance triathlon or equivalent

achievements.name: Elite Strength Pinnacle
achievements.description: Achieve elite strength standards (2.5x bodyweight squat, 3x deadlift, 2x bench)

achievements.name: Calisthenics God
achievements.description: Perform advanced calisthenics like full planche push-ups or one-arm handstand

achievements.name: Global Champion
achievements.description: Win a world championship in any sport

achievements.name: Endurance Legend
achievements.description: Complete a multi-day endurance event like Badwater Ultramarathon

achievements.name: Powerlifting Pro
achievements.description: Compete and place in international powerlifting events

achievements.name: Athletic Icon
achievements.description: Be inducted into a sports hall of fame

achievements.name: Lifetime Fitness
achievements.description: Maintain peak physical condition for 20+ years

achievements.name: Innovation Pioneer
achievements.description: Invent a new training tool or method used worldwide

achievements.name: Mentor of Legends
achievements.description: Coach athletes who become world champions

achievements.name: Extreme Adventurer
achievements.description: Complete extreme physical challenges like summiting Everest

achievements.name: Physique Perfection
achievements.description: Win a professional bodybuilding or physique competition

achievements.name: Global Influencer
achievements.description: Inspire millions through fitness media or programs

achievements.name: Hybrid Athlete
achievements.description: Excel in both strength and endurance at world-class levels

achievements.name: Recovery Sage
achievements.description: Develop and publish research on athletic recovery

achievements.name: Ultimate Polymath
achievements.description: Master 10+ physical disciplines at elite levels

achievements.name: Physical Transcendence

hiddenAchievements.name: Secret Streak
hiddenAchievements.description: Exercise every day for 365 days straight

hiddenAchievements.name: Weather Warrior
hiddenAchievements.description: Train outdoors in extreme weather (below freezing or above 100¬∞F)

hiddenAchievements.name: Fasting Fitness
hiddenAchievements.description: Complete a high-intensity workout after 24-hour fast

hiddenAchievements.name: Injury Comeback

hiddenAchievements.name: Vegan Victory
